summary: Armour Carry Capacity, adds an enchantment to a lot of the in-game armours to increase carry capacity.
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever found your self looking at your Steel armour thinking I wish those pouches worked?
well this mod endeavours to increase your carry capacity on all of the play-able armours from Elven to Daedric to Companions armour.
Hope you enjoy this mod =)

Full list of Increases:
----------------------------
Penitus Cuirass = 15pts
Stormcloak Cuirass = 15pts
Steel Plate = 25pts
Iron Chest = 30pts
Iron (Pauldrons) = 30pts
Fur (Variants) = 15pts/25pts
Elven = 15pts
Studded Imperial = 15pts
Studded armour = 15pts
Stormcloak Officer = 30pts
Steel (Pauldrons) = 30pts
Steel = 30pts
Scaled Horns = 30pts
Scaled armour = 30pts
Orcish = 15pts
Leather = 30pts
Imperial Officer = 30pts
Hide = 30pts
Glass = 25pts
Falmer = 15pts
Dwarven = 30pts
Dragonplate = 35pts
Dragonscale = 25pts
Daedric = 30pts
Blades = 30pts
----------------------------
Future Additions.
----------------------------
Dragonborn and Dawnguard armours will be added soon.


----------------------------
Updates.
----------------------------
Other Optional Files in future will contain higher Carry Points.
author: Daemonlord15
